spi <- read.csv("data/spi.csv")


spi <- spi %>%
  select(country, iso3c, date, SPI.INDEX.PIL1, SPI.INDEX.PIL2, SPI.INDEX.PIL3,
         SPI.INDEX.PIL4, SPI.INDEX.PIL5, SPI.INDEX,
         income, region, population)
